comment.author: 58868147@N00
comment._content: This photo bears a date, seen in reverse on the right of the upper margin. It clearly says 4-12, though the year is hard to read. Given that Carpathia and her captain A. H. Rostron (whose name appears on other photos in this series) were awarded the trophy for rescuing survivors of RMS Titanic on 4/10/1912, it seems likely that the date for the photo should read 4-12-12.
